question: What is the root problem with conventional currency according to Satoshi Nakamoto
text:
So what was the motivation to create Bitcoin? In his announcement of the project, Satoshi Nakamoto gave the following explanation:

"The root problem with conventional currency is all the trust thatâ€™s required to make it work. The central bank must be trusted not to debase the currency, but the history of fiat currencies is full of breaches of that trust. Banks must be trusted to hold our money and transfer it electronically, but they lend it out in waves of credit bubbles with barely a fraction in reserve."
